resources.group_description:
You can see all group participants on a map, they could also you, if you have enabled 'Sending your locations'.
You can plan trips, prepare route points and route tracks for live and integrated navigation on many devices.
resources.with_osmodroid_description: Our official client gives maximum possibilities to work with service
resources.with_osmand_description: OsmAnd is a powerful navigation program that has a specially designed OsMo plugin. You could use it to communicate with each other, share tracks and use navigational functions.
resources.with_website_description: This is an easy and simple way to view and manage via any convenient internet browser
